modName: Playable Karliah's Bow of Setvi - ENG and FR - Skyrim
summary:
Add a playable, craftable, temperable, and enchantable version of the Karliah's Bow, under the MISC smithing category at any forge.
Come in ENG and FR version, with the Ebony Smithing Perk required, or without.
Another (good) mod already add the Karliah's Bow to the game, but in this mod, the Karliah's Bow cost a lot.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b]

Add a playable, craftable, temperable, and enchantable version of the Karliah's Bow, under the MISC smithing category at any forge.
Come in ENG and FR version, with the Ebony Smithing Perk required, or without.
Another (good) mod already add the Karliah's Bow to the game, but in this mod, the Karliah's Bow cost a lot to (be) made.
Or in my mod version, it come with a very low cost to be made.
In the version without perk "just" 3 Ebony Ingots are required.
No DLC or anything be required.
Screenshots, endorsements & supports are welcome.
For translation, please ask first.
Thanks, Setvi.
So here it is, my "Karliaha's Bow" (no wrong misspelling).
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70001-7-1443103244.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cliparts.co/cliparts/dc9/kkM/dc9kkMdc7.png[/img][/center][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][center]Thanks to: Lucio2A.[/center][/size][/color][/b]
author: Setvi
